metadata.Title: CVE-2020-21534 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
fig2dev 3.2.7b contains a global buffer overflow in the get_line functionin read.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-21534` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

fig2dev - 1:3.2.6a-6ubuntu1.1
transfig - 1:3.2.6a-6ubuntu1.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: fig2dev package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:3.2.6a-6ubuntu1.1').
